message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me and has the potential to significantly enhance your endeavors. After careful consideration, I am offering you the chance to own this product at a special price of $1200000. This is a significant discount from its true worth, aiming to make it more accessible to you while ensuring a substantial return for me. I believe this is a fair and advantageous proposition for both parties. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
